tweet_text: @Litalot_now @dailybread4you @CFBHeather That's not true at all. In 2019, 2-loss UGA, 2-loss Florida, 2-loss Alabama, and 3-loss Auburn were all much better teams than 1-loss Big 12 Champion Oklahoma but didn't make the cfp. All you need to do is look at their respective performances against common opponents (aka LSU).
